suppress.notes:
CVE-2023-29827 is disputed by the ejs vendor as "out of scope". The vulnerability requires passing untrusted input to ejs.render(), which is not done in our build process. This is a transitive dependency from vite-plugin-pwa -> workbox-build used only at build time for service worker generation. No user data is processed through ejs templates.
Dependency chain: vite-plugin-pwa@1.2.0 -> workbox-build@7.4.0 -> @surma/rollup-plugin-off-main-thread@2.2.3 -> ejs@3.1.10
Risk Assessment: Build-time only, no runtime exposure, controlled input. Reference: https://github.com/mde/ejs/blob/main/SECURITY.md#out-of-scope-vulnerabilities Issue: https://github.com/mde/ejs/issues/720
